scenario.name: Register UAC
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:mobicents.org SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch]1 From: "ua[call_number]" <sip:ua[call_number]@restcomm.com>;tag=[call_number] To: "ua[call_number]" <sip:ua[call_number]@restcomm.com> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: sip:ua[call_number]1@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 120 Content-Length: 0
